name: Desktop Villagers
description:
Enjoy this demo of Desktop Villagers, Raise your own village and collect multiple villagers for fun. By purchasing the early beta you will get unlimited updates and a free Steam version on release.

How to play

When in-game you will automatically get your first villager. Click on the villagers to give them tasks to do. To manage your village and access the shop just click on your house.

Features 
  • Interact with different villagers
  • Collect Wood, Stone or Gold
  • Your progress is saved
  • Randomly generated  villagers
  • Buy more villagers & upgrade village shop
